alert.note: Alert for Northern El Paso County Including Monument and Black Forest; Southern El Paso County Including Fort Carson and Colorado Springs (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 27 at 2:47PM MST until February 28 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Red Flag Warning is in effect for portions of the I-25 corridor and parts of the eastern plains through 5 pm today... ...A Red Flag Warning has been issued for all of the Southeast plains for tomorrow afternoon... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 6 PM MST TUESDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 226 AND 227... The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 11 AM to 6 PM MST Tuesday. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 226 and 227. * Winds...West 25 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 14 percent.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Northern El Paso County Including Monument and Black Forest; Southern El Paso County Including Fort Carson and Colorado Springs
